title: verify dlp profile actions if none of the specified profile matches
custom_summary: verify dlp profile actions if none of the specified profile matches
custom_preconds:
1. tenant webui should accessible
2. client should be up and running.
custom_steps:
steps:
1. login to tenant webui
2. go to policies -> Inline -> New policy
3. click public app access or DLP tab from dropdown menu
4. select any app
5. select multipe profiles
6. click checkbox of sending content to external DLP inspection
7. select alert at if none of the specified profile matches
custom_expected: default policy action should hit if none of the specified policy matches.
